text: The Wells graph is the unique distance-regular graph with intersection array \\{5,4,1,1;1,1,4,5\\}. . Its spectrum is 5^1 \sqrt{5}^8 1^10 (-\sqrt{5})^8(-3)^5. Its queue number is 3 and its upper bound on the book thickness is 5.Jessica Wolz, Engineering Linear Layouts with SAT. Master Thesis, University of Tübingen, 2018 ==References== ==External links== * A.E. Brouwer's website: The Armanios-Wells graph Category:Individual graphs Category:Regular graphs
title: Wells graph
